Cape Mansion has iPads in Every Room

Behold, it's the totally baller house of the week; there's a bar, a theater, an infinity pool, iPads. Yes, there are iPads.

14 Chestnut Street Boston, MA $190,000

One of Beacon Hill's most desirable tree-lined streets, this exquisite Triplex has 5,000+ sqf ft. of furnished living space. 4+ Beds/3.5 Baths
